price: (94) Then declare what you are commanded[687] and turn away from the polytheists.[688]
arabic: فَٱصۡدَعۡ بِمَا تُؤۡمَرُ وَأَعۡرِضۡ عَنِ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ
footnotes:
[687]- The implication is "Thereby you will distinguish or separate the disbelievers from the believers."
[688]- Any who persist in association of others with Allāh.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'daʿ bimā tu'maru wa-aʿriḍ ʿani al-mush'rikīna
